titles.title: Representative Payee Fraud Prevention Act of 2015
Representative Payee Fraud Prevention Act of 2015
Representative Payee Fraud Prevention Act of 2015
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to prevent fraud by representative payees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with amendments. With written report No. 114-95.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 167.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
